question: Bansi Kaul, who passed away recently, was associated with which profession?
explanation:
Veteran Theatre Director Bansi Kaul, known as the master of stagecraft and painting, recently passed away.
He received several awards including the Sangeet Natak Akademi Award in 1995 and Padma Shri in 2014. He was one of the designers of the opening ceremony of the 2010 Commonwealth Games in Delhi.
